about_the_game:
🌱 Cultivate Your Farm - Plant, water, and harvest a range of fruits and vegetables. Expand your farm as you go to unlock new crops and maximize your yields.

🍲 Cook for Your Customers - Take fresh ingredients from the field to the kitchen! Use your harvest to prepare unique dishes that satisfy your customers' appetites. Perfect your recipes to keep them coming back for more.

💼 Manage Your Day - Balance your time between farming and cooking to meet the needs of your bustling restaurant. Strategize your routine to make the most of each day.

🌍 Explore a Beautiful Low-Poly World - Immerse yourself in a relaxing and colorful world designed in charming low-poly style, with plenty of details to discover.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / RX 570
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Grow crops, cook meals, and manage your restaurant in a colorful low-poly world! Balance farming and cooking, expand your farm, and delight customers with fresh, delicious dishes.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Ukrainian
